name: Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria - All employees and subcontractors are using the correct and complete set of drawings and all drawings are the latest revision.

1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, CEMP, TMP, SWMS, WP and Weed Management Plan
Reference Documents - PSP, WP, CEMP, TMP, SWMS, WMP
Record of conformity - This Signed ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Topsoil used for the works is won from the site.
Record of conformity - This Signed ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Topsoil shall be free from items including:
○ Clay lumps with a diameter greater than 50mm;
○ Stones with a diameter greater than 50mm;
Record of conformity - This signed ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Filling of grassed areas will comply with Airport specification:
○ Free of ridges or water pockets
Reference Documents - MAS-CVL-001 Grassing (Airside) Clause 9.5.2 Tender Clarifications #47
Record of conformity - This Signed ITP

Acceptance Criteria - Application rates shall be in accordance with the Grassing Standard, but not less than six tonnes/ha Flexterra or alternative (Vital Bon / Hydro Mulch 1000) unless agreed otherwise.
Reference Documents - MAS-CVL-001 Grassing (Airside) Clause 9.4.3 Tender Clarifications #45/46
Record of conformity - This signed ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Following grassing works, and where access can be obtained without impacting Airfield operations, the area is to be watered to promote healthy grass growth.
Record of conformity - This signed ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Maintenance of grassed areas until 90% of grass has achieved average height of 100mm.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed

On behalf of Fulton Hogan it is hereby certified that the Works represented by the items of work listed have been tested in accordance with the Project Quality Plan and conform in all respects with the requirements of the Contract.
